   <div class="wrap row home-hero" id="bodytag_4_divWrapRow">
    <section id="hero">
     <ul class="captions">
      <li class="heroSlideLiDragonsAreDancing">
       <div class="caption">
        <h1>
         Dragons Are Dancing
        </h1>
        <p>
         The Drexel Women’s Basketball team is going to the NCAA Tournament! Watch the madness Monday, March 22 at noon on ESPN2 for the matchup against Georgia.
        </p>
       </div>
       <p class="more">
        <a href="https://drexeldragons.com/news/2021/3/13/womens-basketball-complete-improbable-run-to-caa-title-63-52-over-delaware.aspx">
         Learn More
         <span class="sr-only">
          About the Drexel women's basketball team and their progress.
         </span>
        </a>
       </p>
      </li>
      <li class="heroSlideLiThisisYourMoment">
       <div class="caption">
        <h1>
         This is Your Moment
        </h1>
        <p>
         Admitted students,  you have been waiting for your chance to make an impact on the world around you – and now it has arrived. View a special virtual experience built just for you to see how Drexel will help you push beyond all expectations and turn your ambition into achievement.
        </p>
       </div>
       <p class="more">
        <a href="/moment/">
         Learn More
        </a>
       </p>
      </li>
      <li class="heroSlideLiAmbitionCantWait">
       <div class="caption">
        <h1>
         Ambition Can't Wait
        </h1>
        <p>
         Drexel combines academic rigor with a transformative cooperative education program, preparing students to address the challenges of a changing world. Charles D. Close School of Entrepreneurship alumnus Evan Ehlers ‘19 founded Sharing Excess, a nonprofit startup that redistributes unused food to at-risk community members across the Philadelphia region.
        </p>
       </div>
       <p class="more">
        <a href="/ambitioncantwait/">
         Learn More
         <span class="sr-only">
          Learn more about Drexel's cooperative education program
         </span>
        </a>
       </p>
      </li>
      <li class="heroSlideLiLifeChangingScience">
       <div class="caption">
        <h1>
         Life-Changing Science
        </h1>
        <p>
         The School of Biomedical Engineering, Science and Health Systems integrates engineering and life sciences in a global context. The school teaches students to develop solutions and translate science into improving health and saving lives, while encouraging expansive collaboration to take on the world’s emerging challenges.
        </p>
       </div>
       <p class="more">
        <a href="/academics/schools/">
         Learn More
         <span class="sr-only">
          About Drexel's Colleges and Schools
         </span>
        </a>
       </p>
      </li>
      <li class="heroSlideLiPushingtheWorldForward">
       <div class="caption">
        <h1>
         Pushing the World Forward
        </h1>
        <p>
         Through groundbreaking innovations, Drexel engineers are changing the way we live and interact with one another. Working alongside renowned research-focused faculty, students in the College of Engineering learn in a dynamic academic environment and contribute exciting advances that address society’s greatest challenges.
        </p>
       </div>
       <p class="more">
        <a href="/academics/schools/">
         Learn More
         <span class="sr-only">
          Learn more about our colleges and schools
         </span>
        </a>
       </p>
      </li>
      <li class="heroSlideLiTheFutureofBusinessishere.">
       <div class="caption">
        <h1>
         The Future of Business is here.
        </h1>
        <p>
         Students in Drexel’s LeBow College of Business learn to tackle industry challenges with guidance from faculty who are leaders in their fields. With access to state-of-the-art facilities, including our Finance Trading Lab, LeBow students gain the hands-on experiences needed to succeed in highly competitive business-related fields.
        </p>
       </div>
       <p class="more">
        <a href="/academics/schools/">
         Learn More
         <span class="sr-only">
          Learn more about Drexel's colleges and schools.
         </span>
        </a>
       </p>
      </li>
     </ul>
    </section>
   </div>
